name: The Pizza Situation
description:
This demo is still an early WIP! We're still in early development and there are features that haven't been implemented yet. You're probably going to experience some bugs and lack of content. Also, some of the visuals are not finished and we're working on improving the overall game feel and engagement! The demo may be coming and going as we update the game further.

Supported languages are ENGLISH & ESPAÑOL

Follow & help us improve!

If you can leave your feedback, it would help us out so much. Please join our community to help us improve our game!

-also we post way too many memes lol

You can always find more info about the game and about us on our website thepizzasituation.com !
